meanings.sent1: She forgoes dessert to save money.
meanings.sent2: He forgoes his own comfort to help others.
meanings.sent3: The cat forgoes chasing the mouse for a nap instead.
meanings.sent4: The student forgoes sleep to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The athlete forgoes junk food to maintain a healthy diet.
